Package Class

Class Payment

java.lang.Object
Class.Payment
public class Payment extends Object
This class controls the room prices of our hotel, the discount rate that can be applied if any and the tax (inclusive of goods and service tax as well as service charge). Hotel room price differs with the room type as well as the day of the week, weekend prices are more expensive than weekday prices the guest that is going to check in to our hotel. For discount rate, if hotel wants to offer discount they can add it in, discount is accounted with the total bill (total bill includes room bill and food bill). For tax rate, it will be applied to the total bill after discount if applied if any.
Since:
2022-04-12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cheong Jin Hui

    • setRoomPriceByType

      public static void setRoomPriceByType(double weekday, double weekend, String s)
      Sets the prices of a particular room type on weekday and on weekend.
      Parameters:
      weekday - Price of that particular room on a weekday.
      weekend - Price of that particular room on a weekend.
      s - Type of the room.

    • getRoomPriceByType

      public static double getRoomPriceByType(String s, String day)
      Gets the prices of a particular room type on weekday or on weekend, depending on what the staff wants.
      Parameters:
      s - Type of the room.
      day - Either weekday or weekend.
      Returns:
      Weekend price if day is falls on a weekend, Weekday price if day is falls on a weekday

    • displayAllRoomPrice

      public static void displayAllRoomPrice()
      Display the prices of every room type on weekday and on weekend. This allows the staff to have an overview of the cost of each room.
